name: Idle Frenzied Hospital Tycoon
description:
Welcome to Frenzied Hospital! Here your job is to build up your own hospital and turn it into a health care empire. This simulator will get you feeling like a real tycoon! Take care of your patients, perform surgery and other procedures, supervise your managers and get rich! Find ways to cure new diseases, expand the hospital and gain your fortune.

This hospital has everything you need to be the best medical tycoon! Afraid of not knowing what to do? We have a step-by-step tutorial! You can't always play online? Offline earnings to the rescue! Honk-honk! What’s that? We’ve added a parking lot, prepare to receive more clients!

Some idle tycoon features to enjoy:
- Unique treatment methods: hypnotherapy, mysterious inhalations, and much more!
- Up to 135 different machines
- 49 diseases, discover them all
- Different locations to choose from
- 9 medical blocks to unlock
- Different doctors in every department
- Nurses with unique features to boost the productivity
- Lots of levels to upgrade your staff and treatment methods
- Nice sound effects & music

Install idle Frenzied Hospital and become a real medical tycoon!
